verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
El Elah Elohim
How we long to worship You.
El Elah Elohim
How we long to worship You.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord we come to You in worship
No matter what the circumstance.
No matter what the situation
We will lift up holy hands.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Here we are in Satan's Eden
Satan comes to beat us down
But with your Spirit here before us
In righteousness, we'll arise and save
